before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"b3nj8","text":"Todas los cambios que realice en el protocolo se guardarán automáticamente.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2gpf9","text":"Este protocolo describe cómo crear un nuevo protocolo en protocols.io. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"algpc","text":"protocols.io le permite agregar tantos detalles como sea necesario a su protocolo. En el lado derecho del editor, puede encontrar \"componentes\" que le permiten obtener información detallada. El uso de componentes como, por ejemplo, la duración (\"duration\"), lo ayudará a usted y a otros a ahorrar tiempo mientras ejecuta el experimento, ya que habrá un cronómetro establecido disponible en la ejecución.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8k8ui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6dtvi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"44nmc","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5tkdj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6ufgr","text":"Componentes incluidos:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5u8sb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4jn1o","text":"Amount (Cantidad): use si se necesita una cantidad específica de un reactivo. La funcionalidad de \"escala\" en una ejecución de experimento le permitirá escalar fácilmente el protocolo si se utiliza este componente.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bch3t","text":"Duration (Duración): agregue cronómetros a su protocolo.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"76ts8","text":"Concentration (Concentración): agregar detalles exactos de concentración.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2navv","text":"Temperature (Temperatura): seleccione entre una temperatura específica o temperatura ambiente.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"93khp","text":"Equipment (Equipo): busque equipo existente o cree uno nuevo agregando detalles como marca, SKU y especificaciones del equipo.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"51h83","text":"Reagent (Reactivo:) busque el reactivo disponible o agregue uno nuevo. Los reactivos tendrán números de catálogo que pueden enlazar directamente con el sitio del proveedor donde se puede comprar el reactivo exacto.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d1mtm","text":"Command (Comando): para flujos de trabajo computacionales, agregue sus líneas de comando.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8raq4","text":"Dataset (Conjunto de datos): haga que su conjunto de datos esté disponible y vincúlelo con este componente.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aaae1","text":"Software (Software): agregue el software que utilizó para sus métodos.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cvm55","text":"Note (Nota): si necesita notas adicionales para un paso, puede agregarlas con este componente.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aheth","text":"Safety Information (Información de seguridad): si un paso incluye materiales peligrosos, márquelos claramente con el componente de información de seguridad.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fk87h","text":"Expected Result (Resultado esperado): informe al lector qué resultado se espera después de ciertos pasos.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"u6di","text":"Goto (Ir a): si los pasos se repiten a lo largo del proceso, puede vincular a pasos anteriores con este componente.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fdcjg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"qb53","text":"Además de los componentes con los que puede trabajar para que su protocolo sea lo más detallado posible, puede encontrar algunas características adicionales en la parte superior que le permiten agregar enlaces, imágenes, videos, archivos, fórmulas y tablas a su protocolo para cualquier paso.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"97j76","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7e5b4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1vn3k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FB6D0240CCA811ECB743F1E4E2A8218D","height":566,"id":250410,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screen Shot 2022-05-05 at 12.23.56 PM.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hwtnbrt4x.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hwtkbrt4x.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hwtmbrt4x.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hwtjbrt4x.webp","width":383}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EAE4DF70686E11E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":66,"id":"38945","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.01.38.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbbfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbbfw26.png","width":698}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ali81","text":"Haga clic en el ícono + en la esquina superior derecha para abrir el menú principal y seleccione 'New protocol'. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3nfjh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e95nt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9sv5r","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B1F336D0668911E983719BA122060CAF","height":221,"id":"38837","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-24 at 05.07.03.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf7xfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf7xfw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"747r","text":"Añada un titulo. Este será el nombre de su protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7tunq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"92l80","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"32567E40668A11E983719BA122060CAF","height":261,"id":"38838","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-24 at 05.10.10.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf7yfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf7yfw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8la5c","text":"Añada un resumen (abstract). Esta debería ser una descripción breve de su protocolo. Debe poner su protocolo en contexto y dejar que el lector sepa de qué se trata su protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"datbu","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9691FA60668A11E983719BA122060CAF","height":259,"id":"38839","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-24 at 05.14.21.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf7zfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf7zfw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"efvji","text":"Para una mejor visibilidad, agregue una imagen en miniatura (thumbnail image) a su protocolo. Puede ser una imagen de su experimento, sus resultados o el logotipo de su institución.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":61,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"928jj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"arj5l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"89psj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D9E90D80668A11E983719BA122060CAF","height":256,"id":"38840","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-24 at 05.16.26.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf72fw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bf72fw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ml02","text":"Añada todas las autoras y todos los autores de este protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"752sb","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bj52","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"75ho5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D1D27E60685611E99F530B285A8B1888","height":144,"id":"38924","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 12.07.23.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bganfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bganfw26.png","width":670}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"75i6s","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aa5me","text":"Los nombres deben estar separados por comas.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":11,"offset":0,"style":"bold"},{"length":11,"offset":12,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1cnfr","text":"Afiliación (Affiliation): si es posible, agregue el nombre del laboratorio y/o instituto del autor como afiliación.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ei5j","text":"Agregue palabras clave (keywords) a su protocolo que lo ayudarán a organizar sus protocolos y hacerlo más visible para otros cuando se publique.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"21lf2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"81eue","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2aam3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"577803B0685611E99214137C88BE21BF","height":66,"id":"38923","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f9qrh","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 12.05.35.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgamfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgamfw26.png","width":657}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3lv96","text":"Opcional: agregue un enlace externo (External Link, URL) si hay algún enlace al sitio de internet de su laboratorio, de su publicación o cualquier otra información.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7l79q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"53A9EF40685711E99F530B285A8B1888","height":39,"id":"38925","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 12.11.49.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgapfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgapfw26.png","width":656}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eph78","text":"Si el protocolo es parte de un manuscrito publicado, puede agregar la cita al manuscrito (Manuscript Citation.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":39},{"style":"bold","offset":110,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ecnul","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"380gr","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"79E86E70685711E99F530B285A8B1888","height":169,"id":"38926","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 12.13.49.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgaqfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgaqfw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26k5","text":"Puede hacer que su archivo original del protocolo esté disponible como un addendum al protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8rn39","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CDADBE70685711E99F530B285A8B1888","height":200,"id":"38927","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 12.13.26.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgarfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgarfw26.png","width":217}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3d3al","text":"Vaya a la pestaña \"Guidelines \u0026 Warnings\" (Instrucciones y advertencias) en la parte superior del editor de protocolos.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":21},{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1i310","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"862c0","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5sout","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"76pg5","text":"Warnings (Advertencias): agregue cualquier advertencia específica relacionada con su protocolo.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"93i26","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"39A05390685811E99F530B285A8B1888","height":246,"id":"38928","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 12.18.02.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgasfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgasfw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qda1","text":"Guidelines (Directrices): este espacio es para cualquier instrucción, referencias y otra información útil para acompañar el protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9smbd","text":"Before Start (Antes de empezar): esta sección le permite agregar cualquier preparación necesaria o información que el lector debe conocer antes de comenzar el experimento. En los modos de visualización y ejecución, esta sección aparecerá justo antes del primer paso del protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bj3o","text":"Safety Warnings (Advertencias de seguridad): agregue aquí cualquier peligro o precaución de seguridad  si su protocolo incluye trabajar con materiales peligrosos.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12o42","text":"Sensitive Content Warning (Advertencia de contenido perturbador): Si su protocolo incluye contenido que algunas personas pueden encontrar perturbador, asegúrese de que esta casilla de verificación esté marcada. Esto avisará a los lectores al abrir el protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26},{"style":"bold","offset":27,"length":36},{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5gl6o","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4jvqs","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a5nv8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"26F9BB70686F11E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":39,"id":"38946","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.03.26.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbcfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbcfw26.png","width":229}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"apq4k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"93jep","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bfi7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7894FF80686F11E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":337,"id":"38948","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.05.23.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbefw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbefw26.png","width":343.359375}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1d5qm","text":"Cuando haya terminado de ingresar toda la información sobre el nuevo reactivo, haga clic en el botón SAVE (GUARDAR).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"12lb6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cvdr4","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7nmbn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"63r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AD513630686F11E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":297,"id":"38949","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.07.01.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbffw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbffw26.png","width":301.734375}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7m71l","text":"Si desea importar varios reactivos simultaneamente, puede hacerlo haciendo clic en el botón UPLOAD REAGENTS (CARGAR REACTIVOS), que le pedirá que cargue un archivo CSV con la información requerida.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65gfm","text":"Cualquier información adicional sobre los materiales requeridos se puede agregar al cuadro de texto de materiales.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"87dr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f3i79","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"140A3570687011E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":168,"id":"38950","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.09.39.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbgfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbgfw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kvtj","text":"Tienes 2 formas de agregar pasos en el protocolo:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"53p1f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8mn19","text":"Importando los pasos del protocolo desde un documento de texto que ya incluye una lista de pasos numerados o con viñetas.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2hmhr","text":"Creando desde cero los pasos del protocolo.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cg3io","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5h2g8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Importando los pasos desde un texto
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fako6","text":"Ya tiene un archivo de texto que incluye una lista numerada de todos los pasos del protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"93d0a","text":"Haga clic en \"paste from a text file\" (pegar desde un archivo de texto)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bnjei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5gp9g","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"74436330687011E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":212,"id":"38951","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.12.09.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbhfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbhfw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tipo","text":"Pegue sus pasos en la ventana que se abrió.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e8eam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"o2e0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B804A9D0687011E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":313,"id":"38952","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.13.22.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbifw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbifw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44f4u","text":"Seleccione entre \"Each number is a step.\" (Cada número es un paso) o \"Each line is a step.\" (Cada línea es un paso).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ccge","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4phsj","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F904AD90687011E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":313,"id":"38953","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.15.50.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbjfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbjfw26.png","width":690}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ifjf","text":"Haga clic en el botón PREVIEW (VISTA PREVIA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgtdc","text":"Si la vista previa se ve bien, haga clic en el botón ADD THESE STEPS TO PROTOCOL (AGREGAR ESTOS PASOS AL PROTOCOLO).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6mbl5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4k83d","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"c5u72","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"atd84","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7D089B60687111E996EDBBA744CDCCEF","height":312,"id":"38955","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-26 at 15.18.50.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbmfw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgbmfw26.png","width":690}},"1":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4i07n","text":"Los pasos se agregarán al protocolo.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l1vq","text":"Ahora puede editar su protocolo aún más introduciendo secciones y usando los componentes en el lado derecho. Puede encontrar información adicional sobre los componentes en la sección de \"Guidelines\" de este protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"61e6a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mikg","text":"Escriba el nombre de la primera sección de su protocolo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"13omg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ped","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BBF8C9506B8F11E992EBBFD99C876C48","height":182,"id":"39194","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-30 at 14.33.46.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgi4fw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgi4fw26.png","width":690}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvikt","text":"Agregue el contenido del primer paso mientras usa los componentes del lado derecho. También puedes insertar imágenes, videos, fórmulas, etc. con las opciones en la parte superior del editor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6pfrd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5l9gp","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fgpbf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2n7p8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"210A81306B9011E992EBBFD99C876C48","height":206,"id":"39195","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-30 at 14.35.36.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgi5fw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgi5fw26.png","width":690}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"78daa","text":"Puede encontrar información adicional sobre los componentes disponibles en la sección de Instrucciones de este protocolo.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tash","text":"Ahora puede continuar agregando pasos adicionales a su protocolo. Tiene las siguientes opciones para el siguiente paso:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"84m6i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7qh3d","text":"New Step (Paso Nuevo): Esta opción agregará un nuevo paso que pertenecerá a la misma sección que el anterior.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3osa5","text":"New Section (Sección Nueva): Esta opción agregará un paso en blanco con una nueva sección inicial.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1e62e","text":"New Sub-Step (Subpaso Nuevo): esta opción agregará un subpaso del paso actual. (Entonces, por ejemplo, si su paso actual es 22 y agrega un subpaso, el siguiente paso será 22.1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4o9r0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aam1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"100m5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C449E2F06B9011E992EBBFD99C876C48","height":69,"id":"39197","is_image":true,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2019-04-30 at 14.38.37.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgi7fw26.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/bgi7fw26.png","width":690}}}}

title: Cómo hacer un protocolo nuevo
